attributes.action: make enquiry why the new BBC Democracy Live website has hyperlinked sections on the House of Commons, the House of Lords, Northern Ireland, Scotland, Wales, Cymru and Europe - yet strangely omits any reference to England!
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The BBC should note that 85% of the UK's population lives in England and should show respect for this fact.

For some reason, the BBC seems to enjoy showing off its feelings of utter contempt for the English.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
